tachyon.master.file

Class FileSystemMasterClientServiceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.file.FileSystemMasterClientServiceHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface, TachyonService.Iface

    public final class FileSystemMasterClientServiceHandler
extends Object
implements FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
    This class is a Thrift handler for file system master RPCs invoked by a Tachyon client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileSystemMasterClientServiceHandler(FileSystemMaster fileSystemMaster)
      Creates a new instance of FileSystemMasterClientServiceHandler.

      Creates a directory.

      Creates a file.
      void free(String path, boolean recursive)
      Frees the given file or directory from Tachyon.
      List<FileBlockInfo> getFileBlockInfoList(String path)
      Returns the list of file blocks information for the given file.
      long getNewBlockIdForFile(String path)
      Generates a new block id for the given file.
      long getServiceVersion()
      Returns the version of the master service.

      Returns the status of the file or directory.

      Returns the status of the file or directory, only used internally by servers.
      String getUfsAddress()
      Returns the UFS address of the root mount point.
      List<FileInfo> listStatus(String path)
      If the path points to a file, the method returns a singleton with its file information.

      Loads metadata for the object identified by the given Tachyon path from UFS into Tachyon.
      void mount(String tachyonPath, String ufsPath)
      Creates a new "mount point", mounts the given UFS path in the Tachyon namespace at the given path.
      void remove(String path, boolean recursive)
      Deletes a file or a directory and returns whether the remove operation succeeded.

      Renames a file or a directory.

      Schedules async persistence.

      Sets file or directory attributes.

      • listStatus

        public List<FileInfo> listStatus(String path)
                          throws TachyonTException
        Description copied from interface: FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
        If the path points to a file, the method returns a singleton with its file information. If the path points to a directory, the method returns a list with file information for the directory contents.

      • mount

        public void mount(String tachyonPath,
                  String ufsPath)
           throws TachyonTException,
                  ThriftIOException
        Description copied from interface: FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
        Creates a new "mount point", mounts the given UFS path in the Tachyon namespace at the given path. The path should not exist and should not be nested under any existing mount point.
        Specified by:
        mount in interface FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
        Parameters:
        tachyonPath - the path of tachyon mount point
        ufsPath - the path of the under file system
        Throws:
        TachyonTException
        ThriftIOException

      • remove

        public void remove(String path,
                   boolean recursive)
            throws TachyonTException,
                   ThriftIOException
        Description copied from interface: FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
        Deletes a file or a directory and returns whether the remove operation succeeded. NOTE: Unfortunately, the method cannot be called "delete" as that is a reserved Thrift keyword.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file or directory
        recursive - whether to remove recursively
        Throws:
        TachyonTException
        ThriftIOException

      • unmount

        public void unmount(String tachyonPath)
             throws TachyonTException,
                    ThriftIOException
        Description copied from interface: FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
        Deletes an existing "mount point", voiding the Tachyon namespace at the given path. The path should correspond to an existing mount point. Any files in its subtree that are backed by UFS will be persisted before they are removed from the Tachyon namespace.
        Specified by:
        unmount in interface FileSystemMasterClientService.Iface
        Parameters:
        tachyonPath - the path of the tachyon mount point
        Throws:
        TachyonTException
        ThriftIOException
